staxel.village.character.dialogue.MorelL: Here I thought I had discovered a new intelligent species...
But there's still hope! Mushrooms may still someday walk!
As annoyed as I may be with ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;, I suppose she did this with my best interests in mind...
Did she think I wasn't fitting in with the others?
I was merely focusing my attention elsewhere...
Did you know there are some breeds that can control the minds of small creatures?
